title: The Number of the House is 13: A Short Ghost Story
description: On almost every street there is that one house with its story and secrets that everyone avoids. On this street the house was number 13. For two adventurous cousins, the reputation this house has acquired is based on rumor, and they're determined to find out if there is any truth in it. They decide to explore the house to see for themselves what all the fuss is about. As soon as they approach the house, they become aware of a menacing presence. Their plan was to spend the entire night in the house, but with each passing moment the house slowly comes alive as a cold terror creeps in. Will they make it through the night?
author: T.R. Sutherland
